question: Which country was the location of the "2016 Nice truck attack"?
explanation: The 2016 Nice truck attack was sanctioned by the Islamic State as part of the Islamic terrorism in Europe in which a 19-tonne cargo truck was deliberately driven into crowds of people celebrating Bastille Day on the Promenade des Anglais in Nice, an urban area of France, resulting in the deaths of 86 people and the injury of 458 others.
